EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Chicago Office Grand Opening - January 29
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US FOR AN EVENING OF CELEBRATION! Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We're opening our doors to celebrate the opening of our new Chicago office space on January 29.
To show our appreciation for your support, we'd like to invite you to join industry leaders from across Chicago for an evening of networking, conversation and fun.
We look forward to you joining us for drinks, hors d'oeuvres and entertainment while networking with innovative leaders across multiple industries.
Space is limited! REGISTER NOW >> <http://connect.pivotal.io/NorthAm_Event_ChicagoOfficeOpening_Q115_Register-to-Attend.html>
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us <mailto:elogue@pivotal.io>. PIVOTAL OFFICE OPENING 222 Merchandise Mart Plaza Suite 1214 Chicago, IL 60654 Thursday, January 29, 2015 6pm - 9pm REGISTER <http://connect.pivotal.io/NorthAm_Event_ChicagoOfficeOpening_Q115_Register-to-Attend.html>
